# The `WebAssemblyDebugFixup.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Several prior passes may &quot;stackify&quot; registers, here we ensure any references in such registers in debug&#95;value instructions become stack relative also. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Several prior passes may &quot;stackify&quot; registers, here we ensure any references in such registers in debug&#95;value instructions become stack relative also.

This is done in a separate pass such that not all previous passes need to track stack depth when values get stackified.

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// At this very end of the compilation pipeline, if any DBG&#95;VALUEs with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// registers remain, it means they are dangling info which we failed to update</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// when their corresponding def instruction was transformed/moved/splitted etc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Because Wasm cannot access values in LLVM virtual registers in the debugger,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// these dangling DBG&#95;VALUEs in effect kill the effect of any previous DBG&#95;VALUE</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// associated with the variable, which will appear as &quot;optimized out&quot;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65" lineLink="#a0a4e2caf9f334d5092e5e49a53f2d182"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a0a4e2caf9f334d5092e5e49a53f2d182">setDanglingDebugValuesUndef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
